## Carry Recipe
_Norwegian Wiggleproof – Base Size Minus 1 – Traditional Sling Pass + Wiggleproof Pass + Torso Pass_

- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back
- Over shoulder tail comes under arm and baby’s leg for Wiggleproof Pass
- Other tail spread across chest and across baby for a Torso Pass
- Tie at shoulder/Candy cane chest belt/Knotless
